name: Doom Project Version 1.1
description: Selected music replacements for the original Doom Episode 1 (Doom 2 MAP01-MAP09) personalized by the producer himself. E1M1 (MAP01) -- "Diesel Engine" E1M2 (MAP02) -- "Detroit Value" E1M3 (MAP03) -- "Minimal Live" E1M4 (MAP04) -- "Goa Breathing" E1M5 (MAP05) -- "DigiRock Level" E1M6 (MAP06) -- "Move IT" E1M7 (MAP07) -- "Sucka Beat" E1M8 (MAP08) -- "Locomotion" E1M9 (MAP09) -- "Dark"
